author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN BECOMES THE FIRST HURRICANE OF THE 2025 SEASON... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NEAR OR NORTH OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS ON SATURDAY...
summary: ...ERIN BECOMES THE FIRST HURRICANE OF THE 2025 SEASON... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NEAR OR NORTH OF THE LEEWARD ISLANDS ON SATURDAY... As of 11:00 AM AST Fri Aug 15 the center of Erin was located near 18.2, -56.1 with movement WNW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 996 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
